text:
More Testing? More Cases. Simple science. 

The consistently ignored metric are the fatality rates, which, according to WH's Coronavirus Taskforce are the lowest in the world.

WH Taskforce: Reopening America + health safety not exclusive propositions.

@OANN @EmilyRoseFinn https://t.co/UIp6JHiuRy

entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19
